meanings.definition: Infotechs: The field of technology that deals with the creation, storage, and dissemination of information.
meanings.sent1: In school, we learned about infotechs and how they help us store and share information.
meanings.sent2: Many universities offer courses in infotechs to teach students about information technology.
meanings.sent3: The infotechs at the library work hard to organize all the books and make them easy to find.
meanings.sent4: Her brain was like a complex network of infotechs, storing memories and facts for easy retrieval.
meanings.sent5: The infotechs of the internet keep us connected and informed at all times.

meanings.definition: Infotechs: Companies or organizations that specialize in information technology services.
meanings.sent1: My cousin works at one of the top infotechs in the city, fixing computers and networks.
meanings.sent2: Many infotechs offer cybersecurity services to protect businesses from online threats.
meanings.sent3: The infotechs threw a party to celebrate their latest technological breakthrough.
meanings.sent4: The infotechs in the area are like wizards, solving tech problems with ease and expertise.
meanings.sent5: I rely on infotechs to keep my devices running smoothly and securely.
